translation.en: Hold all my calls.
♪ Christmas, Christmas ♪
♪ Christmas, Christmas ♪
♪ Christmas, Christmas ♪
Girls, it's time.
Dad, no.
I have to keep feeding the Christmas Panda or the Panda will die.
translation.it: Devo nutrire il Panda di Natale o morirà.

translation.en: [gasps] His death is on your conscience. I hope bedtime was worth it.
translation.it: Devo nutrire il Panda di Natale o morirà. E tu sarai il responsabile. Spero che dormire valga la pena.

translation.en: Who said bedtime?
It's time for the grand finale of Templeton Christmas Traditions.
translation.it: C'è il gran finale delle Tradizioni Natalizie dei Templeton.

translation.en: Dad tells a holiday-themed story until you fall asleep. Whoo!
translation.it: Vi racconto una storia di Natale per farvi dormire.

translation.en: Do we have to? I'm in the middle of something.
Christmas, Christmas, Christmas-- Hey.
Why do we have to do something just because it's a tradition?
translation.it: Dobbiamo farlo solo perché è la tradizione?

translation.en: I know someone who felt the same way you did.
translation.it: Conosco chi la pensava come te.

translation.en: Who? Do I know them? Do they have a beard?
Or a curse that makes them sing?
It was actually your Uncle Ted.
And once upon a time...
Sneaky story intro.
When he was a baby, he hated our Christmas traditions,
translation.it: Da bambino, odiava le nostre tradizioni,

translation.en: even though they were the most awesome traditions ever.
translation.it: anche se erano le più belle del mondo.

translation.en: Five days before Christmas, we played...
[all] Shock That Elf.
-It's your dad's year to be the elf. -All right.
But me and my elf buddy here are pretty hard to--
translation.it: Ma io e il mio amico, siamo...

translation.en: -Merry Christmas. -[shouts]
[adult Tim] Four days before Christmas, we'd make cards for our grandparents.
translation.it: Quattro giorni prima, facevamo le cartoline per i nonni.

translation.en: A Christmas tree.
A reindeer.
The baby made Santa's sleigh.
translation.it: Il bimbo ha fatto la slitta.

translation.en: [adult Tim] Three days before Christmas, we'd sing the most soulful
translation.it: Tre giorni prima cantavamo "The Night Before Christmas"

translation.en: bass-and-glockenspiel rendition
of "The Night Before Christmas" you've ever heard.
♪ 'Twas the night before Christmas And all through the house ♪
translation.it: Era la notte di Natale In tutta la casa

translation.en: ♪ Not a creature was stirring Not even a mouse ♪
translation.it: Niente si muoveva Neanche un topolino

translation.en: [adult Tim] Two days before Uncle Ted's first Christmas, that's when the magic started.
translation.it: Due giorni prima del primo Natale dello zio Ted, è iniziata la magia.

translation.en: Work with me, baby.
Aw, there. Our handsome little elf.
Ooh! I'm gonna grab the camera.
I thought Christmas was a day, not a month.
translation.it: Il Natale dura un giorno non un mese.

translation.en: You can't contain Templeton traditions to one day.
translation.it: Le nostre tradizioni non entrano in un giorno.

translation.en: That's like trying to hold eight ants. Too many ants.
translation.it: Sarebbe come tenere otto formiche in una mano.

translation.en: You performed "The Night Before Christmas" three days before.
translation.it: Avete cantato "The Night Before Christmas" tre giorni prima.

translation.en: Performing it on the actual night before Christmas is bad luck.
translation.it: Ma la notte stessa, porta sfortuna.

translation.en: Uh, you put a gingerbread fellow in my pocket?
translation.it: Perché ho un biscotto in tasca?

translation.en: Because it is good luck.
And yet I'm still here,
wearing this.
Where's yours?
Not participating in today's "dress like a court jester" tradition?
translation.it: Non segui la tradizione di vestirti da buffone?

translation.en: That's not today's tradition. We--
Who's ready to get their pictures taken with Santa?
translation.it: Chi vuole la foto con Babbo Natale?

translation.en: I'll be right there with you the whole time.
We sit on his lap, tell him what we want.
It's the easiest and best tradition. You don't have to freak out.
translation.it: È la tradizione più bella. Non devi spaventarti.

translation.en: Tim, check this out.
A snowball?
I'm gonna throw it in Santa's face.
What? You'll get on the naughty list.
Oh, I'm always on the naughty list.
I don't give old Kringle the power to suppress my animal instincts.
translation.it: Il vecchio non soffocherà i miei istinti.

translation.en: But only good kids get presents.
translation.it: Solo i buoni hanno i regali.

translation.en: Do only they?
Naughty-listers get the greatest present of all, coal.
translation.it: I cattivi hanno il meglio, il carbone.

translation.en: The black rock with a million uses.
translation.it: La roccia nera che serve a 1000 cose.

translation.en: Heat, decoration, other. It's a win-win.
Want me to split this in two? We can totally flank Santa.
translation.it: La dividiamo in due? Attacchiamo Babbo Natale.

translation.en: No, I work hard to stay on the nice list.
translation.it: No, io cerco di restare tra i buoni.

translation.en: Who do you think gave them quarters for massages?
translation.it: Gli ho pagato io i massaggi.

translation.en: Suit yourself.
We should probably get up.
I've been trying to.
Come on up.
Timothy Templeton. Four T's in it.
This is Theodore. Same last name, one less T.
translation.it: Lui è Theodore. Una T di meno.

translation.en: Boss Baby.
Um, what is happening?
We used to work together, a long time ago.
Wait, Santa is--
Former Baby Corp.
As disloyal as a cat with trade secrets to sell.
Oh, Boss Baby.
I'm just trying to spread joy and happiness.
translation.it: Voglio solo portare gioia e felicità.

translation.en: Blah, blah, blah. I heard it all the day you quit. When will Mommy and Daddy take a picture?
translation.it: L'ho sentito quando ti sei licenziato. Quando fanno la foto?

translation.en: -Honey, take a picture. -I'm trying, I'm just so relaxed.
translation.it: - Tesoro, fa' la foto. - Provo, ma sono tropo rilassata.

translation.en: I left Baby Corp because I had this idea of how to make the world a happier place with Christmas cheer.
translation.it: Ho lasciato la Baby Corp per rendere il mondo più felice, a Natale.

translation.en: Think it's working?
You're doing fine.
Don't side with this hippie.
He betrayed everything Baby Corp stands for.
He poached half the company for his toys-for-nothing program.
translation.it: Ha rubato alla ditta per dare regali gratis.

translation.en: And he's exploiting baby labor to make those toys.
translation.it: E fa lavorare i bambini per fare i regali.

translation.en: Elves. Elves make the toys.
Oh, come on. That's just marketing.
Whoa, they are babies?
-Okay, say cheese. -Cheese.
Smile for your parents.
I will never be caught smiling with a commie like--
translation.it: Non sorriderò mai con un comunista come...

translation.en: Gotcha.
-[grunting] -I'm on the nice list, right?
Tippy top.
Yes. For Christmas, I want Football Mike Canadian Football Edition
translation.it: Sì. Voglio Football Mike edizione canadese

translation.en: with the locker room Jacuzzi playset.
You write that request in official letter form?
Now he loves paperwork.
You know it.
Drop it off with my elves, and have a Merry Christmas.
translation.it: Mandala agli elfi, e buon Natale.

translation.en: Thanks, Santa. You too, bye.
I see you, Danny Petrosky.
Naughty list life forever.
See? Wasn't that fun, little guy?
Look, Cracklin' Bones O'Dell and the Caroling Cracklettes.
translation.it: Ossa Scricchiolanti O'Dell e gli Scricchiosuoni.

translation.en: Put me down. I have a score to settle.
You won't do anything to get me on the naughty list?
translation.it: Non mi manderai sulla lista dei cattivi, vero?

translation.en: I'm not a monster, Templeton.
Santa Claus is.
So, Ron, you like getting mail?
translation.it: Allora, Ron, ti piace ricevere la posta?

translation.en: Well, here's a special delivery.
Not like you to be sleeping on the job on Christmas Eve, Dongle.
translation.it: Non è da te, dormire sul lavoro alla vigilia di Natale.

translation.en: It's Christmas Eve? Where am--? Oh!
You still owe me 300 hollyberries, Dongle. Pay up.
translation.it: Mi devi ancora 300 bacche di pungitopo, Dongle. Paga.

translation.en: Why are you calling me--? Where--?
Don't play dumb, Dongle.
I want my money before Boxing Day. Get it?
translation.it: Voglio i soldi prima di S. Stefano.

translation.en: Do get it. Not Dongle.
Dongle! I'm so jolly to see you.
translation.it: Dongle. Sono così felice di vederti.

translation.en: Not Dongle.
What's up with your voice, Dongle? Are you sick?
translation.it: Cos'ha la tua voce, Dongle? Stai male?

translation.en: I'm not Dongle.
Everybody, come quick.
Dongle's sick.
Can you see? Look at me.
I'm not Dongle!
[Tim] It's Christmas Eve.
-You'll love it. -Santa, Dongle is sorry for sleep--
translation.it: - Ti piacerà. - Babbo Natale, Dongle è...

translation.en: -What did you do with my brother? -What did you do with Santa?
translation.it: - Dov'è mio fratello? - Dove hai messo Babbo Natale?

translation.en: Oh, no. Are you...?
Dongle's name is Ding Dong Dongle.
translation.it: Dongle si chiama Din Don Dongle.

translation.en: Yeah, but you're an elf?
Superior toymaker of the North Pole.
When Dongle makes a toy, so many jaws drop to the floor
that the jaw doctor can buy a new mansion.
You made a rocking horse from the crib?
translation.it: Hai fatto un cavallino con la culla?

translation.en: Is it perfect?
Then yes.
Wait, so if you're here, then my brother is...
translation.it: Ma se tu sei qui, mio fratello è...

translation.en: At the North Pole, of course. Does Dongle look like he is from Texas?
translation.it: Nel Polo Nord. Ti sembra che Dongle venga dal Texas?

translation.en: Imagine cowboy hat Dongle.
translation.it: Immagina Dongle col cappello da cowboy.

translation.en: Very handsome.
So he's with Santa? Aw.
We gotta get him back now.
It's his first Christmas. We have more traditions he has to do.
translation.it: È il suo primo Natale. Dobbiamo seguire le tradizioni.

translation.en: Dongle needs to get back now.
Or the world will be bombarded with inferior toys
that blacken children's hearts.
My brother works at Baby Corp, so all we--
translation.it: Mio fratello lavora alla Baby Corp...

translation.en: Baby Corp. Can't make toys to save their lives.
translation.it: Non sanno fare giocattoli neanche in sogno.

translation.en: Does that situation come up a lot?
Dongle could tell you stories.
Yes, please. But later.
Baby Corp is our only hope to get out of this.
translation.it: Ora, la Baby Corp è l'unica speranza.

translation.en: Jimbo, Staci, we have a situation.
T-W-A-F-E-R.
TWAFER.
"Tommy wants a fire engine, red."
-TWAFER. TWAFER. -[door opens]
Not now, Dongle.
I'm not Dongle, Ron.
Boss Baby? What the jingles are you doing here?
translation.it: Baby Boss? Che campane ci fai qui?

translation.en: The question is, how the jingles do I get out of here?
translation.it: La domanda è: "Come campane me ne vado da qui?"

translation.en: Oh. I'd love to help, but I'm memorizing letters.
translation.it: Ti aiuterei, ma sto imparando le lettere.

translation.en: If I don't get their requests locked down, it'll take me weeks to deliver gifts.
translation.it: Se non ricordo le loro richieste, impiegherò settimane a consegnare.

translation.en: Speaking of jingles, "jingle."
"Judy is now getting lavender earmuffs." J-I-N-G-L-E. JINGLE.
translation.it: "Carla aspetta maglione polsi azzurri niente elastici". CAMPANE.

translation.en: You're an embarrassment to efficiency. Get a computer.
translation.it: Sei molto inefficiente. Prendi un computer.

translation.en: The elves and I are like a family business.
translation.it: Io e gli elfi siamo un'attività famigliare.

translation.en: They make the toys, I do this.
translation.it: Loro fanno i regali, io questo.

translation.en: These are our family traditions,
and they've made everyone happy for a long time.
translation.it: e hanno fatto felici tutti da molto tempo.

translation.en: Yay for your family. Take me home to mine, Big Beard.
translation.it: Urrà alla tua famiglia. Ora riportami dalla mia.

translation.en: I'm busy. I'll take you tonight when I deliver presents.
translation.it: Ti darò un passaggio stanotte, quando consegnerò.

translation.en: What do I do in the meantime?
Help make a few toys, and maybe learn about the Christmas spirit.
translation.it: Aiuta a fare i regali, e impara lo spirito natalizio.

translation.en: -Any word on rescuing my brother? -Sorry, ran into a snag.
translation.it: - Notizie di mio fratello? - C'è stato un intoppo.

translation.en: Typical Baby Corp incompetence.
Typical Dongle excellence.
I won that trophy for excellence in trophy modeling.
translation.it: Ho vinto quel trofeo nella gara di trofei.

translation.en: Stop making stuff out of stuff. What's the snag?
translation.it: Smetti di trasformare le cose. Che intoppo?

translation.en: Chupie tech is jammed at the North Pole. Stupid Santa Claus.
translation.it: La tecnologia Ciupa è bloccata al Polo Nord. Stupido Babbo Natale.

translation.en: Watch your mouth, Baby Corp mongrel.
It's less than 24 hours until my brother's first Christmas.
translation.it: Mancano 24 ore al primo Natale di mio fratello.

translation.en: If we can't chupie there, we have to find another way.
translation.it: Dovremo trovare un altro modo per arrivarci.

translation.en: Mom and Dad will be worried sick.
You relax. Dongle will take care of everything.
This one's from Aunt Dorothy. "Merry Christmas from Aunt Dorothy."
translation.it: Questa è della zia Dorothy. "Buon Natale dalla zia Dorothy".

translation.en: Oh, that's nice.
Is that a grenade?
Don't be foolish. Dongle doesn't explode parents.
translation.it: Scherzi? Dongle non fa esplodere i genitori.

translation.en: Dongle kills with poison gas.
What?
[Mom] Do you smell?
Dongle told a sick joke.
This is Santa's sleeping dust for when the children stay up to see him.
translation.it: È il sonnifero di Babbo Natale, per non farsi vedere.

translation.en: What the heck?
Drama is the spice of life.
translation.it: Il dramma è il sale della vita.

translation.en: Should give us time to get to the North Pole and back.
translation.it: Avremo tempo per andare al Polo Nord e tornare.

translation.en: But with them asleep,
I have to do the shopping for our traditional fruitcake hockey.
translation.it: la spesa per la torta di frutta tradizionale.

translation.en: Which we play while wearing Hawaiian leis made from snacks. So fun.
translation.it: E le collane hawaiane fatte di cibo.

translation.en: Point is, we need to move fast.
No sweat. Santa has magic portals in every mall.
translation.it: Babbo Natale ha portali nei centri commerciali.

translation.en: They appear every night after business hours,
but only until 9 a.m. the day before Christmas.
translation.it: fino alle 9:00 di mattina della vigilia.

translation.en: We have 20 minutes.
Why didn't you tell us before?
Were you not paying attention when Dongle told you drama is the spice of life?
translation.it: Non hai sentito Dongle dire che il dramma è il sale della vita?

translation.en: So this is where Christmas comes from?
translation.it: Quindi il Natale viene da qui?

translation.en: You bet.
We got Jingly Jangly there doing wrapping paper design.
translation.it: Là c'è Campanellina che disegna le carte d'imballaggio.

translation.en: Ribbon testing with Tippy Tappy Sloppy.
translation.it: Tino Tana Frana testa i fiocchi.

translation.en: Okay, okay, that one is good.
[PoopyDoopy] Lala Doo-Da and Diddly Doo write all the best carols.
translation.it: Lala Du-Da e Dadadu scrivono tutte le più belle canzoni.

translation.en: What kind of nog-house open-mic garbage is that?
translation.it: Che razza di canzone da bettola è quella?

translation.en: You wouldn't know a hit if it knocked your tooth out.
translation.it: Tu non capisci niente di musica!

translation.en: And of course, toy-making with me, PoopyDoopy, filling in for Dongle.
translation.it: E io faccio i regali insieme a PupiDupi, al posto di Dongle.

translation.en: I admire your skill.
Why thank you.
But I can't help noticing inefficiencies in your systems.
translation.it: Ma noto che il vostro sistema è inefficiente.

translation.en: What?
I notice you make all your gingerbread from the eggs of a single goose?
translation.it: Fate i biscotti con le uova di una sola oca?

translation.en: That's not just a goose. She's Ginger the Gingergoose.
translation.it: Non è una semplice oca. È Zenzi l'oca di zenzero.

translation.en: Sure. And dare I ask a follow-up?
Why have those elves been rubbing gumdrops on the egg for two hours?
translation.it: E perché quegli elfi strisciano caramelle sull'uovo da due ore?

translation.en: To make it the best gingerbread in the whole world.
translation.it: Per fare il miglior pan di zenzero del mondo.

translation.en: Dubious claim.
Try this.
This is really good. What's the secret?
translation.it: È molto buono. Qual è il segreto?

translation.en: It's made with store-bought chicken eggs and was stuffed in my pocket.
translation.it: È fatto con uova di supermercato, e l'ho in tasca da ieri.

translation.en: [all] Delicious.
You guys get it now?
We need to put our gingerbread in your pocket.
translation.it: Dobbiamo mettere i biscotti nelle tue tasche.

translation.en: No, my point is efficiency.
You can't mess up gingerbread. Just crack eggs in some batter.
translation.it: Il pan di zenzero è facile. Mettete le uova nell'impasto.

translation.en: Why does this goose even have a job, right, Ginger?
translation.it: Perché non lasciate in pace quest'oca, eh, Zenzi?

translation.en: -[squawks] -What else needs fixing around here?
You're watching paint dry? I thought you were on a deadline.
translation.it: Guardate la vernice che si asciuga?

translation.en: -We take pride in our wrapping paper. -Just to be torn open?
translation.it: - Siamo fieri della carta. - Che sarà strappata?

translation.en: You're wasting time.
But this is the way we've always done things.
Not anymore.
Boom, efficiency. Hit me with another one.
Carol writers, right?
Supposed to be.
But Diddly Doo overdid it on the milk and cookies again.
translation.it: Ma Dadadu ha esagerato col latte e i biscotti.

translation.en: Well, excuse me, Mother.
You ever feel like working?
We'll work when I tell you. If I can make a suggestion-- Oh!
translation.it: - Lavoriamo quando lo dico io! - Se posso suggerire...

translation.en: [both] Don't mess with our creative process.
You've got the talent of a wreath.
translation.it: Hai il talento di una ghirlanda.

translation.en: They're fine. What else you got?
I'm not laughing. Toss it.
Spin me up on this nonsense.
Everyone knows, ribbon is no good if it doesn't tickle me.
translation.it: I nastri non sono buoni se non mi fanno solletico.

translation.en: I don't think that's true.
Oh, but it is.
No, it's not.
Pretty sure it is.
He's a genius.
Could it be, everything we've been doing has been wrong?
No telling, but yes.
Please, walk with me.
[gasps] A walk-and-talk? You're getting the hang of this efficiency thing.
You're telling me.
You've been here an hour, and our productivity is up 20 percent.
translation.it: Sei qui da un'ora e la produttività è aumentata del 20 percento.

translation.en: We might actually get a nog break before Santa leaves.
translation.it: Potremmo fare una pausa, prima della consegna.

translation.en: Why settle for nog? Imagine what else you could have.
translation.it: Solo una pausa? Immaginate cos'altro potreste avere.

translation.en: Computers for naughty/nice cross-reference.
translation.it: Computer per catalogare buoni e cattivi.

translation.en: Industrial ovens for mass gingerbread baking.
Break rooms full of gumdrop delights.
And of course, mahogany crafters' lamps.
Yes, to ward off snow monsters.
translation.it: Sì, per spaventare i mostri delle nevi.

translation.en: Mahogany lamps ward off snow monsters?
Mahogany does.
Weird, I was just trying to class up the joint.
We should redo this entire floor in mahogany.
translation.it: Rifacciamo tutto il piano in mogano.

translation.en: Mahogany? No. Why?
It'd help Christmas cheer if no one was eaten by a snow monster.
translation.it: Il Natale sarebbe più felice se il mostro non mangiasse nessuno.

translation.en: These reforms will take an upfront investment.
What's your cash on hand?
Fifty trillion hollyberries.
-In dollars? -Seven.
Okay, we need to raise revenue.
What do you charge to get on the nice list?
translation.it: Quanto costa essere tra i buoni?

translation.en: The only charge is being the best you can-- [Boss Baby] Honk, honk.
translation.it: Basta essere il più bravo possibile...

translation.en: You sillies are practically feeding cash to the reindeer.
translation.it: State regalando i soldi alle renne.

translation.en: But it's always been free.
And your boss always wears a red suit to a home invasion.
translation.it: E il capo invade le case sempre vestito di rosso.

translation.en: Tradition's a dumb reason to do anything.
You're running a business that's stalled out below its potential.
translation.it: La vostra attività può rendere di più.

translation.en: It's killing my soul.
But good news?
You've got me.
The portal.
What? Yes. Hurry up, let's go.
Unmade toys, Dongle is coming.
You had to stop at the snack cart?
I'm pulling double duty.
I have to rescue my brother and keep my family traditions from dying.
translation.it: Devo salvare mio fratello e le tradizioni di famiglia.

translation.en: Stop being so dramatic. There has to be a simple solution.
Four plane tickets to the North Pole.
translation.it: Quattro biglietti per il Polo Nord.

translation.en: Great. Does anyone have $11,000?
I have 700 hollyberries.
I had to buy a winter hat.
I only have 10K five hunny.
So close.
Look, super speedy delivery.
"Santa letters and packages delivered to the North Pole before midnight"?
translation.it: "Lettere consegnate al Polo Nord prima di mezzanotte"?

translation.en: We follow the next delivery truck to the airport,
sneak on a jet disguised as food-service workers.
translation.it: saliamo sul jet vestiti da camerieri.

translation.en: When the crew asks, "Is that low-fat?"
translation.it: E se chiedono: "C'è il cibo light?"

translation.en: I go, "No, it's high fist."
Double thumpers into a roundhouse kick.
We've put two on the ground, because I'm good at kicking.
translation.it: Due a terra, perché sono brava coi calci.

translation.en: But we can't control the cockpit until we defeat six crooked co-pilots,
translation.it: Ma per pilotare, dobbiamo sconfiggere i copiloti

translation.en: each trained in a deadly martial art.
My plan was better.
Oh! Watch your elbows, Jimbo.
[Tim] Dongle, don't eat all my snacks.
-[Dongle] Dongle is not eating anything. -[chewing]
I hear little Chloe is on the naughty list...
What's it worth to you to get Josie into nice?
translation.it: Pagherebbe per mettere Josie nei buoni?

translation.en: Start Scooter on the $50 nice package...
translation.it: Il pacchetto da 50 dollari per Scooter...

translation.en: Isn't everything more beautiful when it's profitable?
translation.it: Non è tutto più bello, quando rende?

translation.en: This makes me feel yucky,
like a sticky candy cane that fell on a floor.
translation.it: come una caramella caduta per terra.

translation.en: Remember, you're helping to finance more efficient toy-making.
translation.it: Ricorda che così si faranno regali migliori.

translation.en: Things are looking up for your compensation.
We're gonna get more Christmas cheer?
-You get paid in Christmas cheer? -I wish.
translation.it: - Ti pagano in gioia natalizia? - Magari.

translation.en: We get paid in twinkly smiles,
which can be exchanged for Christmas cheer.
translation.it: che possiamo cambiare in gioia natalizia.

translation.en: You have to trade in at the Santa shop.
translation.it: Si cambiano nel negozio di Babbo.

translation.en: They're only open for a half-hour on Thursdays.
translation.it: È aperto solo mezz'ora, il martedì.

translation.en: Unless you send your smiles by penguin messenger, which takes months.
translation.it: O mandi i sorrisi col pinguino, ma ci vogliono mesi.

translation.en: What kind of hustle is Santa running on you?
translation.it: Che imbroglio vi sta facendo Babbo Natale?

translation.en: We love Santa. We're like a family business.
Are you? I know Dasher and Dancer and Prancer and Vixen.
translation.it: Sì? Conosco Dasher, Dancer, Prancer e Vixen.

translation.en: All the reindeer do for 364 days a year is eat grass and poop.
translation.it: Le renne mangiano e fanno cacca per 364 giorno l'anno.

translation.en: You elves do all the work, and I couldn't name one of you.
translation.it: Voi fate tutto il lavoro, e non so i vostri nomi.

translation.en: Except you, DookiePoops.
-PoopyDoopy. -Forget how things have always been done.
What do you deserve right now?
I would like a little recognition.
translation.it: Io vorrei un po' di riconoscimento.

translation.en: [all] Yeah.
-Right. -We should talk to Santa.
[man 1] Last delivery for the season.
[man 2] Put it there, right next to the gigantic pile of letters.
translation.it: Mettilo lì, vicino alla montagna di lettere.

translation.en: -[man 1] Merry Chri-- -[door closes]
We're here.
Good. Dongle is hungry.
Even though Dongle did not eat the snacks.
translation.it: Anche se non ho mangiato gli snack.

translation.en: Uh, you aren't letters to Santa. I'm disappointed.
translation.it: Voi non siete lettere. Sono deluso.

translation.en: But I like feeling disappointed, so mixed bag.
Remove your funeral suit, sad vampire.
Dongle is here.
Is this the North Pole?
"North Pole." Yay, we're here.
[Tim] It says "Noth Pole." You left out the R.
translation.it: Dice "Polo Nod". Hai scordato la R.

translation.en: At least I didn't write it backwards. We could've ended up in Elop Htron.
translation.it: Fortuna che non l'ho scritto a rovescio, o saremmo a Olop Dron.

translation.en: This is the Noth Pole?
I'm the Noth Pole. That's my name.
I changed it so all the letters to Santa with that misspelled word come to me.
translation.it: Mi chiamo così per ricevere tutte le lettere con indirizzi sbagliati.

translation.en: It's thrilling.
That's a weird thing to be excited about.
Why? This is a pile of hopes and dreams
translation.it: Perché? Queste sono speranze e sogni

translation.en: I can sell to collectors for a lot of money.
We need to get to the North Pole. And quick. Is that possible?
translation.it: È possibile arrivare velocemente al Polo Nord?

translation.en: It's a 30-minute chartered jet ride.
I can make anything happen.
translation.it: Posso farvici arrivare. Posso fare qualsiasi cosa.

translation.en: I'm Noth Pole.
-Yay. -[Noth] But I won't.
I don't really feel like it. Don't touch my pile.
translation.it: Non mi va. Non toccare le lettere.

translation.en: Dongle touched nothing.
These letters go for a fortune in Tokyo, along with gum chewed by politicians,
translation.it: Queste valgono oro a Tokyo, come le gomme americane dei politici,

translation.en: industrial blueprints from mobile home manufacturers...
What happens with the kids who wrote the letters?
translation.it: E i bambini che le hanno scritte?

translation.en: They just don't get what they want for Christmas.
translation.it: Non ricevono i regali che vogliono.

translation.en: What? That's horrible.
No, I think you missed it. I get money.
translation.it: No, non hai capito. Io faccio i soldi.

translation.en: Making money off of Christmas?
That's crazy.
Thank you, boy.
Your shouted words have inspired me to change--
translation.it: Le tue parole mi hanno ispirato a cambiare...

translation.en: Yay, it's a Christmas miracle.
translation.it: Sì, è un miracolo di Natale.

translation.en: --my business model.
When Santa doesn't deliver and children weep,
translation.it: Se i bambini piangono, i genitori

translation.en: parents will do anything to get them their toys,
translation.it: fanno qualsiasi cosa per dargli il regalo

translation.en: even buy them from me at a huge markup.
translation.it: anche comprarlo da me a prezzi esorbitanti.

translation.en: Don't you use my ideas for evil.
translation.it: Non usare le mie idee per il male.

translation.en: You turned my letters into a nutcracker in ten seconds?
translation.it: Hai fatto un soldatino in dieci secondi?

translation.en: -No. -[Noth] No, him.
Five seconds.
Ten is for lazy toymakers who are not Dongle.
translation.it: I giocattolai pigri lo fanno in dieci.

translation.en: I like his style.
I've devised a deal.
I'll charter that flight,
but Dongle stays with me to make 10,000 toys for profit.
translation.it: ma Dongle resta con me, per fare 10.000 regali da vendere.

translation.en: No, we're not leaving Dongle.
Go save your brother with the handsome face
that would look better in glasses.
Dongle will catch up.
-You sure? -Merry Christmas.
You press that button, Dongle will get you out of any jam.
translation.it: Premi il pulsante e Dongle ti tira fuori dai guai.

translation.en: Mostly toy-building jams. That is where the button is of most use.
translation.it: Soprattutto se si tratta di costruire giocattoli.

translation.en: -Thank you, Dongle. -Okay, this hug is done.
I'm going to the North Pole.
How do you handle the excitement of being at the real North Pole?
translation.it: Posso contenere la felicità di essere al Polo Nord?

translation.en: You don't.
It looks like Baby Corp.
[Jimbo] But Christmas-ier.
Let's go over the plan.
Me and Tim look for Boss.
I'll find what they're using to jam our chupie transport tech, and smash it.
translation.it: Io distruggo ciò che usano per bloccare la tecnologia di trasporto Ciupa.

translation.en: Got that, Tim?
I'm at the North Pole.
Can you keep it together?
I'm actually in Santa Town. I'm gonna...
translation.it: Sono nella città di Babbo Natale!

translation.en: Um, hello?
Anyone home?
Anyone making toys?
Anyone Santa?
It's gingerbread.
Jimbo. Don't eat the toy factory--
Dang, break me off some of that wall.
translation.it: Caspita, dammi un po' di muro.

translation.en: Stop chewing. I hear actual North Pole Christmas Cheer.
translation.it: Basta mangiare. Sento dei canti natalizi.

translation.en: Then Santa said, "Thanks, Tippy Tappy Slappy."
translation.it: Babbo ha detto: "Grazie, Tino Tana Rana".

translation.en: But I'm not Tippy Tappy Slappy. I'm Tippy Tappy Sloppy.
translation.it: Ma io non sono Tino Tana Rana. Sono Tino Tana Frana.

translation.en: Ugh. Breaks my heart.
Who's got another complaint about Santa's mismanagement?
translation.it: Chi ha altre lamentele sulla cattiva gestione di Babbo Natale?

translation.en: There's the boss. Hi.
We should have suggestion boxes, but we don't.
So how do we suggest we get one?
What did you do?
Uh, good to see you too.
Where's the fun and jolly toy making? This is Santa's factory.
translation.it: Dov'è l'allegra fabbrica di Babbo Natale?

translation.en: Really? It's Santa who clocks in? Santa who carves the horsies?
translation.it: Davvero? Lo vedi lavorare? Costruire i cavallini?

translation.en: Santa spring-loading jack-in-the-boxes?
You're messing with Christmas.
It's a mess. I'm cleaning it up.
Christmas is perfect. Everyone loves Santa and his elves.
translation.it: Tutti amano Babbo Natale e gli elfi.

translation.en: Sorry to interrupt.
We're trying to recall Santa's nicknames, but couldn't remember.
translation.it: Cercavamo di ricordare i soprannomi di Babbo Natale.

translation.en: Can you help us?
Sure, Santa, Santa Clause, St. Nick, Kriss Kringle, Father Christmas--
translation.it: Babbo, Santa, Santa Claus, San Nicola, Papà Natale...

translation.en: Cool, cool.
-Now name an elf. -What?
You said, everyone loves Santa and his elves.
translation.it: Hai detto che tutti amano Babbo Natale e gli elfi.

translation.en: You know every single one of Santa's nicknames.
translation.it: Conosci tutti i nomi di Babbo Natale.

translation.en: Surely you know just one of our names.
translation.it: Sicuramente conosci il nome di uno di noi.

translation.en: Blitzen? Blitzen?
Kid's confusing us with those antlered stink horses?
translation.it: Ci confonde con quei cavalli cornuti?

translation.en: You done did it now.
[PoopyDoopy] I'm done being a cog in the Christmas wheel.
translation.it: Non voglio più essere un ingranaggio

translation.en: A wheel we probably made.
translation.it: di un meccanismo creato da noi.

translation.en: [shouts] Santa's factory? Ha!
This is our factory.
[elves] Yeah!
Santa?
How long have you been-- What did you hear?
Enough.
All I wanted was to make everyone happy.
Well, you sure blew that.
Yeah.
[elf] We should get better than this.
You're right.
I hope I can do better next year.
-[elves gasping] -[PoopyDoopy] Not the naughty list.
translation.it: Babbo Natale Sulla lista dei cattivi.

translation.en: Santa.
There he is. On his sleigh.
-I can't believe it. -I know.
He teleported to a sleigh that would take two minutes to walk to.
translation.it: Si è teletrasportato, ma era vicinissimo.

translation.en: Explains the, uh... [grunts]
No, I can't believe he's gone.
translation.it: È incredibile che sia andato via.

translation.en: Santa can't go on the naughty list. He's Santa.
translation.it: Non può essere sulla lista dei cattivi.

translation.en: Why does it feel like a man cave on Mother's Day?
A re-org like this usually takes weeks.
We should be celebrating.
Yeah, get it.
We had a misunderstanding.
Got the chupies working. Let's jet.
Look at that. Still time to play fruitcake lacrosse.
translation.it: Guarda. C'è tempo per giocare a lacrosse.

translation.en: -Hockey. -One of those boarding school sports.
translation.it: - Hockey. - Uno di quegli sport da ricchi.

translation.en: What about Santa? What happens with Christmas?
These elves got it covered.
Uh... Not really.
This was about recognition for making toys.
translation.it: Volevamo un riconoscimento per i regali.

translation.en: Delivering them is Santa's thing. Because, you know, the sleigh.
translation.it: Ma Babbo Natale li consegna, con la slitta.

translation.en: This isn't a Santa problem. It's a logistics problem.
Call in the paper pushers.
Simmons, Hendershot. On my location.
Is this the secret Christmas Party? Bring on the nog.
translation.it: È la festa di Natale? Portate lo zabaione.

translation.en: -[both chanting] Nog, nog, nog-- -I got something better than nog.
We're gonna solve Christmas toy delivery logistics.
One fire dog, coming up.
This stump taken?
Santa? Why are you--?
Is this about the naughty list?
translation.it: È per la lista dei cattivi?

translation.en: That snowball to the kisser should've sealed the deal.
translation.it: La palla di neve non è bastata.

translation.en: No one is questioning your naughtiness, or mine.
translation.it: Nessuno discute della tua cattiveria, o della mia.

translation.en: Whoa, you finally made the jump?
Danny, you've been on my naughty list
translation.it: Danny, sei sulla lista dei cattivi

translation.en: since you were old enough to pass gas at will.
Continue.
I joined the list 20 minutes ago, and I feel like crud.
translation.it: Io ci sono appena entrato e mi sento uno schifo.

translation.en: But here you are, happy as a clam, roasting hot dogs on a fire--
translation.it: Ma tu sei felice, cuoci hot dog sul fuoco...

translation.en: Is that last year's bundle of coal?
Doesn't that taste like-- West Virginia?
Oh, yeah.
So how do we live with ourselves when we've been so naughty?
Papa Noel, I'm glad you asked.
translation.it: Babbo Natale, te lo spiego io.

translation.en: First get rid of this idea that naughtiness is bad.
translation.it: Non pensare che essere cattivi è male.

translation.en: Naughty living is very healthy and very normal.
translation.it: Essere cattivi fa bene ed è normale.

translation.en: What? You just...
Got my veggies in the naughtiest way.
translation.it: Mangio verdura nel modo più cattivo.

translation.en: Nice needs naughtiness like night needs day
translation.it: I buoni hanno bisogno dei cattivi

translation.en: and turtles need shells to hide their eyes during scary movies.
Give a naughty man a hotdog, he'll have a hotdog.
translation.it: Da' un hotdog a un cattivo, e ha l'hotdog.

translation.en: But teach a naughty man to hotdog, and he'll have a ton of hotdogs.
translation.it: Ma insegnagli a procurarseli e ne avrà mille.

translation.en: [man] My ear lobe.
Don't forget, every Christmas morning,
naughty kids wake up to coal, which is dead dinosaurs.
translation.it: i cattivi ricevono carbone, ossia dinosauri morti.

translation.en: So while nice kids play with toys...
translation.it: I bambini buoni hanno i giocattoli...

translation.en: ...we're playing with dead dinosaurs.
And that's rad.
[Tippy Tappy Sloppy] Approaching target. Open flaps.
Opening flaps.
And release.
Yes, Templeton?
What makes you think you can do Christmas without Santa?
translation.it: Pensi di fare il Natale senza Babbo Natale?

translation.en: Uh, the fact that we are.
Let's get industrial fans,
make sure she can handle monsoons in the South Pacific.
translation.it: per vedere se sopporta i monsoni.

translation.en: This isn't the same. You need magic and wonder.
translation.it: Non è uguale. Ci vuole la magia.

translation.en: Or Christmas is just a bonus birthday with a tree.
translation.it: Sennò diventa come un compleanno, con l'albero.

translation.en: Yes, but you will get a lot of toys.
translation.it: Sì, ma ci saranno molti regali.

translation.en: -Toys. -Toys.
-Toys. -Toys.
There's more to Christmas than toys.
translation.it: Non ci sono solo i regali.

translation.en: It's how awesome it is to see boot marks on snowy roofs.
translation.it: Sono le impronte sul tetto innevato.

translation.en: -See if we can fake boot marks. -On it.
It's seeing Santa's cookies gone, except a half-eaten one.
translation.it: Vedere che Babbo Natale ha mangiato i biscotti.

translation.en: Kids pick it up like, "Santa's teeth touched this."
translation.it: E i bambini pensano che ne abbia lasciato uno.

translation.en: You're holding on to Christmas past. This is Christmas future.
translation.it: Ti aggrappi al passato. Questo è il futuro del Natale.

translation.en: Satisfaction guaranteed.
All sales final.
Ha. Silly Gingergoose.
Hello, animal that is not a dog.
translation.it: Ciao, animale che non sei un cane.

translation.en: Dongle, where have you been?
The usual. Living the most incredible life.
Who's your friend?
My chisel is my friend.
My sander is my confidant.
This one gave me a ride. We are not friends.
translation.it: Quello mi ha dato un passaggio.

translation.en: We're also not enemies. We're next to each other.
-Any more questions? -Yeah, where are my hollyberries?
translation.it: - Altre domande? - Sì, dove sono le mie bacche?

translation.en: No more questions from you. But one from Dongle.
Where is the big man?
This is all wrong.
Your fellow elves fighting for recognition is wrong?
translation.it: È sbagliato lottare per il riconoscimento?

translation.en: No, if anyone loves recognition, it's Dongle.
You are Dongle.
I recognize you.
Santa does more than bring toys Dongle makes.
translation.it: Babbo Natale non solo consegna regali.

translation.en: He brings people together, makes people feel good.
translation.it: Riunisce le persone, le fa sentire felici.

translation.en: Told you.
The world is changing. It's time Christmas catches up.
translation.it: Il mondo cambia. Il Natale deve aggiornarsi.

translation.en: How you sleep at night?
Guilt won't work on me. Does Dongle look like a disappointed grandmother?
translation.it: - Il senso di colpa non mi tocca. - Sembro una nonna arrabbiata?

translation.en: Simple question. How you go to sleep?
Like every hardworking baby American.
Tucked into a firm swaddle with a belly full of milk
and a night-night kiss from Mommy and/or Daddy.
translation.it: e col bacio della buona notte.

translation.en: Night-night kiss is unnecessary, no?
translation.it: Il bacio della buona notte è superfluo, no?

translation.en: You are tired, full, swaddled. You fall asleep no matter what.
translation.it: Sei stanco, fasciato. Ti addormenti ugualmente.

translation.en: I don't need the kiss, but I like--
translation.it: Non ne ho bisogno, ma mi piace...

translation.en: Oh, you led me right into that.
Christmas without Santa is like bedtime without night-night kiss.
translation.it: Natale senza Babbo, è come dormire senza bacio della buona notte.

translation.en: No one wants that.
Fine, you're all big elves. You want Santa back? Go get him.
translation.it: Va bene. Rivolete Babbo Natale? Cercatelo.

translation.en: No, you go.
No chance. Why me?
Because from what you tell Dongle, the Christmas man, he left in bad shape.
translation.it: Perché Babbo Natale è andato via affranto.

translation.en: Hollow on the inside, like a grocery store chocolate nutcracker.
translation.it: Vuoto come un soldatino di cioccolata.

translation.en: He asks himself, "Who am I anymore?"
[Dongle] You break a Santa, you got to fix a Santa.
translation.it: Se rompi Babbo Natale, lo aggiusti.

translation.en: -When you break a Santa this bad, -[snoring]
translation.it: E se lo rompi così gravemente,

translation.en: only one thing can put his heart back together:
Seeing a bah-humbug stinker like you find the Christmas spirit.
translation.it: mostrargli che un imbroglione come te trova lo spirito natalizio.

translation.en: You will go get Santa.
And what happens if I don't?
Singing.
-Excuse me? -Hit it.
♪ He's vicious ♪
♪ He's twisted ♪
♪ He's Boss Baby ♪
♪ The baby that ruined The baby that ruined ♪
♪ The baby that ruined Christmas ♪
translation.it: Il bambino che ha rovinato il Natale

translation.en: Ooh. Catchy hook.
Yeah, throw in some verses and a bridge,
translation.it: Sì, qualche verso e un attacco,

translation.en: I bet we could get the whole world singing this.
translation.it: e il mondo intero la canterà.

translation.en: Please, don't.
[Diddly Doo] ♪ He came to the North Pole And started fussing ♪
translation.it: Viene al Polo Nord A far confusione

translation.en: ♪ Made Santa cry With all his cussing ♪
translation.it: Con gli insulti Fa piangere Babbo Natale

translation.en: [Lala] ♪ He took Father Christmas All sweet and loved ♪
translation.it: Ha preso il dolce Babbo Natale

translation.en: ♪ And showed him just where He could shove it ♪
translation.it: E l'ha buttato In mezzo alla neve

translation.en: [both] ♪ He's vicious ♪
♪ He's twisted ♪
♪ He's Boss Baby ♪
♪ The baby that ruined The baby that ruined ♪
♪ The baby that ruined Christmas ♪
translation.it: Il bambino che ha rovinato il Natale

translation.en: This song makes me wanna dance.
And get rid of our Christmas-ruining baby.
translation.it: E buttiamo il bambino che rovina il Natale.

translation.en: [Diddly Doo] ♪ On Christmas morn All the kids did weep ♪
♪ For not a single toy Lay beneath their feet ♪
translation.it: Perché non avevano Neanche un regalo

translation.en: [both] ♪ And just in case you forgot his name ♪
translation.it: E se non ricordate il nome

translation.en: ♪ The baby who we all should blame ♪
translation.it: Del bambino che ha rovinato tutto

translation.en: ♪ Theodore Leslie Templeton ♪
♪ Shame, shame, shame ♪
♪ Christmas burned down ♪
♪ And he lit the flame ♪
I love this song and hate this baby.
translation.it: Adoro la canzone e odio il bambino.

translation.en: ♪ He's vicious ♪
♪ He's twisted ♪
♪ He's Boss Baby ♪
♪ The baby that ruined The baby that ruined ♪
♪ The baby that ruined Christmas ♪
translation.it: Il bambino che ha rovinato il Natale

translation.en: Fine.
Promise me that song never leaves this room, and I'll go get him.
translation.it: Non pubblicate la canzone e io vado a prenderlo.

translation.en: But we still have a problem.
I'd get him, but I don't know where he is.
[Noth] I can find him.
I'm the Noth Pole.
He gives me creepy motel check-in vibes.
translation.it: Mi fa paura come i motel sinistri.

translation.en: Can you really find Santa?
Yes, for a price.
I want the letters to Santa.
-All of them. -[Tim] No way.
Santa needs those to know what every kid wants.
translation.it: Servono per sapere cosa vogliono i bambini.

translation.en: Oh. I'd love to help, but I'm memorizing children's letters.
If I don't get their requests locked down, it'll take me weeks to deliver gifts.
translation.it: Se non le ricordo, impiegherò settimane a consegnare i regali.

translation.en: Deal. You can have every letter.
[all] What?
That's it. Every letter.
We did our part. You do yours.
The smiling red one lurks at the mall in your hometown.
translation.it: Il Rosso ridente è nel centro commerciale della tua città.

translation.en: I'll remember none of you.
-[shouts] -Go.
I can't help it. One more time. Two, three, four.
translation.it: Non ce la faccio. Ancora. Due, tre, quattro.

translation.en: ♪ The baby that ruined The baby that ruined ♪
♪ The baby that ruined Christmas ♪
translation.it: Il bambino che ha rovinato il Natale

translation.en: You here?
Yo, Ronny.
[groans] Santa?
Time to go.
Boss Baby?
But if someone like you would come for me,
translation.it: Se uno come te mi viene a cercare,

translation.en: it's never too late to change things.
translation.it: non è mai tardi per cambiare le cose.

translation.en: There's no amount of naughtiness the Christmas spirit can't--
translation.it: Lo spirito del Natale può superare ogni cattiveria...

translation.en: Gonna cut you off before you embarrass yourself worse than that outfit does.
translation.it: Smettila prima di renderti ancora più ridicolo.

translation.en: I'm only here because if I don't bring you back,
two pint-size hitmakers are gonna smear my good name all over the Top 40.
translation.it: due canzonettisti mi rovinano il nome.

translation.en: Diddly Doo and Lala Doo-Da?
I thought the elves were all mad at me because of how naughty I've been.
translation.it: Pensavo che tutti gli elfi ce l'avessero con me.

translation.en: You're not naughty,
just stuck in your ways, and grossly inefficient.
What do you pay in reindeer maintenance for one night of use?
translation.it: Quanto paghi una renna per lavorare una notte sola?

translation.en: Can't you lease?
But for reasons beyond me, the elves want you back for Christmas.
translation.it: Per motivi incomprensibili, gli elfi ti rivogliono.

translation.en: -And what about you? -What?
What do you want for Christmas?
Hey, I'm stuck in my ways.
You want something from Santa? Ask. I don't make the rules.
translation.it: Vuoi una cosa per Natale? Chiedila. Non faccio io le regole.

translation.en: You absolutely make the...
[groans] Fine.
I got it. I got it.
-Come back to the North Pole. -What, little boy?
translation.it: - Vorrei che tornassi al Polo Nord. - Cosa, bambino?

translation.en: [yelling] I'd like you to come back to the North Pole.
translation.it: Vorrei che tornassi la Polo Nord.

translation.en: Santa can do that for you.
I think we just had a Christmas spirit breakthrough.
translation.it: Lo spirito natalizio si è fatto strada.

translation.en: Is this what it feels like?
I also want a tie clip, a gold one with wings on it.
And one of those electric shoe polishers you see in golf club locker rooms.
translation.it: E un lustrascarpe elettrico come nei club di golf.

translation.en: And gift cards. They're tacky, but it's like plastic money.
translation.it: E buoni regalo. Sono come soldi di plastica.

translation.en: That's what the Christmas spirit is.
Asking for things you don't need and don't have time to get.
translation.it: Chiedere cose che non ti servono.

translation.en: -No. -Well, hey, you tried.
You have the worst catchphrase.
Yeah? What's yours?
translation.it: Sì? E qual è il tuo?

translation.en: Oh. I was trying to make "fart poop doody" work, but...
[groans] Do your dumb laugh.
You've been busy.
Santa, I'm sorry.
It was everyone else who messed with all the stuff--
-I like it. -I helped.
Dongle. It's jolly to see you.
Dongle is a comforting presence.
A gift from all of us.
But don't worry, Dongle made it.
A Baby Corp monitor? Um--
Press the talky button.
I'm Baby Corp.
I'm incompetent.
First rule of business, I'm dumb.
Second rule, I forgot, because I'm dumb.
translation.it: Seconda regola: dimenticata perché sono tonto.

translation.en: Look at the bottom.
[Santa] "Dongle"?
We put our names on everything,
translation.it: Ora mettiamo i nostri nomi su tutto

translation.en: so the children know why they weep with joy when they get a Dongle toy.
translation.it: così i bambini sanno perché sono felici coi regali di Dongle.

translation.en: It's not the way things have always been done, but...
translation.it: Non è sempre stato così, ma...

translation.en: If the way things are always done leaves people unhappy, who needs it?
translation.it: Se la gente è infelice per come abbiamo sempre fatto le cose, cambiamo.

translation.en: It's perfect. I'm sorry I didn't think of this years ago.
translation.it: È perfetto. Scusate se non ci ho pensato anni fa.

translation.en: Anyone know if this is edible?
It's that late?
[Jimbo] It's not edible.
We don't have time. What have I done?
translation.it: Non c'è tempo. Cosa ho fatto?

translation.en: I'll never get the presents out tonight.
translation.it: Non riusciremo a consegnare i regali.

translation.en: Is this guy's name Santa or Can't-a?
translation.it: Come? Babbo Natale non lo può fare?

translation.en: Efficiency, Ron. Still got those gifts memorized?
Do I? TWCAFIJ.
Tim Wants Canadian Action Figure in Jacuzzi.
translation.it: Tim Vuole Pupazzo Canadese Con Jacuzzi.

translation.en: He's got them.
-Yeah! -[elves cheering]
Elves, Baby Corp,
let's Christmas.
-Like "let's do this" but-- -We got it. We just don't like it.
translation.it: - Come: "facciamolo" ma... - Capito. Non ci piace.

translation.en: -[shouts] -Let's Christmas.
-Yeah! -[all cheering]
Release.
-Toys. -Toys.
-Toys. -Toys.
I'd like your most expensive pinky ring.
translation.it: Voglio il vostro anello più caro.

translation.en: Let's just say I've got enough letters
to fill vending machines from Miyazaki to Hokkaido.
translation.it: da vendere da Miyazaki a Hokkaido.

translation.en: What?
[Tim] Dear Noth, stop selling letters.
translation.it: Caro Nod, smetti di vendere lettere.

translation.en: It's not nice.
Here's a present, anyway. Love, Tim.
translation.it: Ma ecco un regalo. Auguri, Tim.

translation.en: The scary broken toy I wanted as a kid, but never got.
translation.it: Il pupazzo rotto pauroso che non ho mai avuto.

translation.en: Mom, Dad?
It's Kyle.
[girl 1] A ten-speed bicycle from Ding Dong Dongle, and it's made from wood.
translation.it: Una bici con dieci marce di Din Don Dongle, in legno.

translation.en: [girl 2 in French] Jingly Jangly made my teddy bear.
translation.it: Campanellina ha fatto il mio orsetto.

translation.en: [boy] A baseball mitt.
And Tippy Tappy Sloppy the Elf made it.
translation.it: E l'ha fatto l'elfo Tino Tana Frana.

translation.en: Lucky the kids got Mom's genetics, because Dad is a pile of yikes.
translation.it: Fortuna che i bambini hanno la genetica della mamma.

translation.en: [boy] Santa?
-[paper ripping] -[gasps] A yo-yo.
Made by PoopyDoopy the Elf?
Thank you, Santa and PoopyDoopy.
I love it, and promise to share with everyone.
translation.it: È bellissimo, prometto di condividerlo con tutti.

translation.en: How do we get past the kid?
-You sick St. Nick. -[boy snoring]
I can't believe I delivered presents with Santa.
translation.it: Ho consegnato i regali con Babbo Natale!

translation.en: Every last one.
Free of charge.
Oh, please, I helped.
Doesn't mean I'll dump my portfolio and move to a commune.
translation.it: Ma non butto il mio portfolio.

translation.en: Thank you, Santa.
Merry Christmas.
So, what lame teachable gift
that sums up this whole experience do you have for me?
translation.it: Allora, quale brutto regalo istruttivo che riassume questa esperienza hai per me?

translation.en: Santa?
Hello?
Nothing?
Don't you want me to get the Christmas spir--? Ow!
translation.it: Non vuoi che lo spirito natalizio...

translation.en: They call me MC Christmas.
The C also stands for Christmas.
-Ted, it's Christmas morning. -What?
We forgot to make snack leis. We'll starve during fruitcake hockey.
translation.it: Abbiamo dimenticato le collane di cibo. Moriremo di fame.

translation.en: We'll ruin our sweet little guy's first traditional Templeton Christmas.
translation.it: Rovineremo il primo Natale tradizionale del piccolo.

translation.en: What if he isn't into the traditional Templeton Christmas?
translation.it: E se non gli piace il Natale tradizionale Templeton?

translation.en: They're family traditions. Our family's different now.
translation.it: Sono tradizioni famigliari. La famiglia è cambiata.

translation.en: If the way we always do things makes one of us unhappy,
translation.it: Se le tradizioni rendono infelice qualcuno,

translation.en: let's do different things.
-I could come up with new ideas. -Family brainstorm.
translation.it: - Io avrei un'idea. - Riunione di famiglia.

translation.en: What are fun words that rhyme with "wreath"?
Santa gave me snack leis, so this tradition is back on.
translation.it: Ho ricevuto collane di cibo, la tradizione resta.

translation.en: [both] Fruitcake hockey in the driveway.
-We'll get the sticks. -Wrap the baby in sofa cushions.
translation.it: - Le mazze. - Avvolgi il bimbo nei cuscini.

translation.en: Your mom plays violent.
I'll talk them out of that.
You don't have to throw out every tradition for me.
translation.it: Non eliminate tutte le tradizioni per me.

translation.en: You'll do fruitcake hockey and snack leis?
translation.it: Fai l'hockey e le collane di cibo?

translation.en: This wearable choking hazard? No.
translation.it: Questo coso che mi strozza? No.

translation.en: But I'll play your holiday dessert Canadian stick game.
translation.it: Ma giocherò al vostro gioco canadese.

translation.en: -You will? -It's nonsense.
But it can't be all bad if it brings people together, and gets you all smiley.
translation.it: Ma non può essere male, se vi avvicina e vi fa sorridere.

translation.en: Just like Santa.
I guess. I mean, if you squint and don't think about it--
translation.it: Sì. Se cerco di non pensarci...

translation.en: No. Feeling Christmas spirit. [shouts]
[Tim] Goal!
[Danny gasps] I got a sock full of dead dinosaurs.
translation.it: Ho un calzino pieno di dinosauri morti.

translation.en: Merry Christmas to all.
The end.
That was in no way a "make us fall asleep" story.
translation.it: Non era una storia per farci addormentare.

translation.en: -I have so many questions. -Yeah.
Wasn't your setup about why we should do goofy traditions even if we don't want to?
translation.it: Cerchi di farci rispettare tradizioni strane?

translation.en: You bailed on that with your brother.
-Then he did some, but not others. -What's the takeaway?
translation.it: - Lui ne ha fatte solo alcune. - Qual è la morale?

translation.en: Want easy lessons? Go to kindergarten.
-[Tina] Can I? -Not until you're 5. Go to sleep.
translation.it: - Posso? - Quando avrai cinque anni. Dormi.

translation.en: -Five? -How?
You opened a Pandora's box of moral ambiguity.
translation.it: Hai aperto il vaso di Pandora dell'ambiguità.

translation.en: Can we go to the zoo if I don't make fun of the capybaras?
translation.it: Andiamo allo zoo se non prendo in giro la capibara?

translation.en: You grew up big and weird.
Okay, all done. Dongle kill kids.
Very funny.
Fool me once, shame on you. Fool me twice--
translation.it: La prima volta, vergognati, la seconda...

translation.en: Dongle is serious. The big one deserved it.
translation.it: Sul serio. La grande lo meritava.

translation.en: She stopped feeding the Christmas Panda and it died.
translation.it: Ha fatto morire il Panda di Natale.

translation.en: What?
Dongle tricked you again for drama.
translation.it: Dongle ti ha preso in giro di nuovo.

translation.en: You are welcome for the spice of life.
Merry Christmas.
[adult Tim] Merry Christmas.
